name: Donquixote Doflamingo
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Donquixote Pirates
effect: [On Play] DON!! −3: Choose one: • If your Leader has the {Donquixote Pirates} type, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 8 or less. • Up to 3 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 7 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.
